name: Lay Golden Eggs Free
description:
Late one night a farmer makes a mysterious discovery, that his barn has a little stowaway living inside! What’s more is that this little fellah lays… Golden Eggs!

Help your little chicken friend successfully lay his golden eggs safely in his nest. Combining a wonderful physics engine, extremely clever puzzles and beautiful graphics. Use the sticks, crates, balls, magnets, bubbles and other items to lay the eggs in the nest. Lay Golden Eggs is surely a must have game.

Lay Golden Eggs Highlights:
-Combines realistic physics with simple, yet accurate, and precise touch control
-Use precise timing to avoid obstacles
-Collect three golden stars in each stage. Some are easy, some are a little on the harder side
-Avoid jagged spikes and fight the power of a magnetic pull

Features:
-3 incredible worlds with 30 levels to conquer
-Easy to learn with tutorial levels
-Combines realistic physics with simple, yet accurate, and precise touch control
-Beautiful graphics
-Cool sounds and music

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
